meta.description: CLEANED v2: Pure temperature translation layer with non-repeating neutral thermal descriptors per 5°C bin. No time-of-day, no seasonal language, no behavioural bias, no indoor implications.

range_neg_40_to_neg_35.label: -40°C to -35°C
phrases: ultra‑subzero temperature presence in open air
ultra‑subzero thermal character of the air
ultra‑subzero temperature pressure in the environment
ultra‑subzero overall thermal load in the air
